title: Sausage pie
ingredients: ['Pastry', '280g (10 oz) plain flour', '1 pinch salt', '140g (5 oz) fat (butter, margarine or lard)', 'Filling', '450g (1 lb) sausagemeat', '1 medium onion, chopped', '1 tablespoon tomato sauce', '1 teaspoon dried sage or mixed herbs', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'milk for brushing']
